website_summaries.verdict: Gives you all of the bells and whistles you expect in a larger QLED TV, all at a great price.
pros: Offered in three screen sizes: 55, 65, and 75 inches, all at a nice price for QLED tech
Includes a cable organization feature that keeps hardware looking clean
Gives you Ambient Mode so you can select what's displayed on the screen when you aren't watching a TV show
cons: If you wall-mount the television, the cable organization feature will not work as well

website_summaries.verdict: Deep blacks and bright, vibrant colors are all the more striking with an anti-reflective screen that reduces glare from ambient light.
pros: HDR enhances the picture to show off vibrant colors
No-bezel set, picture goes to edge of screen
QLED set does not get picture burn-in
cons: Smart TV interface bogged down with pre-installed apps
Advertising appears in Smart TV and menu screens

customer_reviews.title: Bloatwear garbage!
customer_reviews.text: What is Samsung thinking! They sell a $2800 tv and pre-install 23 different tv service such as Facebook video, Amazon music and mlb.tv then you can NOT edit or REMOVE them. You can only edit or remove apps you install. Buy a brand that focuses on consumer experience not on co-marketing dollars. FYI these app eat up almost half of you storage space. FAIL
customer_reviews.author: the phone guy

customer_reviews.title: I'm in LOVE ❤
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 65 y/o woman & although it's a bit heavy, I put the screen & stand together myself & then lifted it up on to the entertainment center. Setup was a breeze. This TV was to replace an LG that only lasted 2 years; so, there was no way I was buying another LG. After reading all the reviews, this sounded exactly what I was looking for. The one setup box makes it so easy if you need to add or unplug HDMI cables & it alleviates you ever having to move the TV screen to do this which I always found to be a pain in the neck. Color is gorgeous. Sound is very good. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie A

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: Awesome TV. As you can see the One Connect looks awesome with minimal wire hang or having to bust up your wall. I used the Samsung Flush mount. Found a stud and was able to connect two bolts. Menu nav is better than ever. QLED delivers as promised. The only thing I did not expect was the red Samsung light at the base that shines when the tv is off. No option to turn it off. Somewhat annoying but to tell the truth whenever I’m in the room the TV is on so not that big a deal. Bottom line, I got a good deal on a product listed as used for $1,800 and was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Was a little worried by some of previous reviews. My tv arrived in perfect condition. It’s only a month old, so I can’t address any reliability issues. I have been skeptical about claims to the latest and greatest anything electronic. This tv delivers! The picture is just phenomenal. The colors pop. I am happy I dropped the big bucks and bought this tv.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G. Lawhead

customer_reviews.title: Don’t risk your precious money and Time on this!
customer_reviews.text: The TV came in perfect condition but the problem came immediately present when booting up for the first time. The light will bleed from the lettering and pictures. Colors on screen also appear very cloudy. I’ve tried every TV mode and setting but still same defective results. Removing power actually helped show the TV colors for 5 minutes but soon same horrible color downgrade will re-appear and never go away. Don’t risk your money on this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: WhaleDisease

customer_reviews.title: Must have received a lemon!
customer_reviews.text: Had the TV for one day before the screen started messing up. Now have a permanent 4" wide vertical bar on the screen. After contacting Samsung customer service for third time and having them try to remotely troubleshoot the issue they could not figure it out. Now have a service scheduled for the TV. Absolutely disappointed. Not sure what will happen or if it will have to be replaced. In the meantime we have to watch it with the screen like it is.
customer_reviews.author: cthomp

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal picture, user-friendly,  Best TV I’ve ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Samsung QLED in a year. The picture is stunning. Setup was user friendly. Pleasantly surprised to find the Q7 has no separate power plug. Power runs, along with audio and 4K video, through the razor thin One Connect wire. As a result, the One Connect box is larger due to the power transformer. I easily snaked the single wire through the wall. Using a direct Ethernet for top quality streaming. I mounted the TV to the wall using the Samsung NO Gap Wall Mount, and surround sound through a Bose 700 Soundbar, bass, and surround. Easy set up, absolutely phenomenal picture. Fantastic features and easy integration with all my devices. I highly recommend the Q7!
customer_reviews.author: M. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Really amazing picture which stays amazing in bright light conditions
customer_reviews.text: Great picture all around. A big strength is the clarity of the picture in bright light conditions! We have a lot of windows and it is really great to not have to draw all of the blinds when watching TV during daylight hours.
customer_reviews.author: Iowa Consumer

customer_reviews.title: QLED does not equal OLED
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV think that QLED was the Same as OLED. Shame on me. It is not the same - not even close. And by the time I found out about the difference it was too late to return the TV to Amazon. It does have a nice picture and the smart TV parts work OK but it IS NOT an OLED TV.
customer_reviews.author: Big Easy Man

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, Awful Speakers
customer_reviews.text: First things first, we have bought nice speakers to pair with this, I’m only noting this because it was inexcusably bad. The speakers on this tv are 100% trash; they sound (at low volumes) as if they came out of package being blown out. We haven’t turned them up loud or anything, but they crackle terribly. We are super happy with everything else about this TV but it’s inexcusable to pay this amount of money for a TV and receive this quality of speakers as stock speakers with it. Thankfully we have a sound bar coming tomorrow so we don’t have to deal with this after that, but it really takes away from the experience.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick & Mia

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: A new product arrived on time after the delivery of a defective TV. Their customer service representative was great. The TV is excellent and what I expected. The One Connect is great! I recommend the no-gap surface mount.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Spingath

customer_reviews.title: Shipped in good condition and on time
customer_reviews.text: Great TV for mixed usage. Picture quality is great, but less than ideal viewing experience in a perfectly dark room due to the ineffective local dimming feature. It has an excellent color reproduction and it is very bright, great for HDR content. The TV has an excellent low input lag, which is perfect for use as a PC monitor or for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Anisa Mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Good TV
customer_reviews.text: The Smart TV apps have better performance than any I've seen in the past. These are actually usable. Only issue I have is that there are no CBS apps. Totally missing. So I still need a external device for those. Cost, 1 star in my rating. The One Connect concept is a great idea. No doubt it cuts maintenance costs. Picture quality is exceptional. I don't really know about the sound since I use a theater amp. The UI is a bit wonky, but I general get where I need to be.
customer_reviews.author: eh

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best !!!
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best Tv I have ever owned period. Amazing picture !! I have the Tv mounted on the wall with their flat wall mount and looks great and very easy to install. Still learning everything about the tv but I can say I’m extremely happy with my purchase. You will need a optical cable to hook up your surround sound I couldn’t get it to work through hdmi. This Tv rocks !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Cox

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Samsung TV: QLED noticible picture quality and featured Apps
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about this TV SET. QLED is awesome. We bought the UHD maybe $2-300 less and it just didnt tickle my eyes so we sent it back. This QLED is the next best thing from the OLED. Features.....The apps are probably worth as much as the TV itself. HBO dropped Dish, so we watch TVplus, Youtube, Hulu, Netflix, and everything else. So many features....wireless or ethernet....Bought ours from Vanns, said it was used but it was unopened never used....wait for this model, they haveone every week at a substantial savings. We use the wall mount from the other Samsung and use the Bose speaker too. love love love this tech.
customer_reviews.author: John Penrose

customer_reviews.title: TV with a 4 month life span
customer_reviews.text: I decided to go with another Samsung TV, because of the fact that I got 13 years out of the Samsung that this TV replaced. Bad idea! After 4 months, this TV will no longer power on. I've reported the issue to Samsung support and they are going to send a technician out to repair it. It's now been a week and a half, and the status of the repair is still in the parts are being shipped to the technician state. If you're looking for a quality TV from a manufacturer that cares about customer service after you've paid them a large sum of money, don't waste your time with Samsung!
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Software is very undependable. There are no smart features here.
customer_reviews.text: Go ahead and purchase this TV and buy you a headache. Yes, the picture is great, but the software is horrible. I know now why I don’t own a Samsung phone. I had to call the Samsung service each night for a week. Out of 5 service personnel, only one knew more about the TV than me. The TV would lock up, lose WiFi connection, and then I would have to renter the WiFi password each time. This was so frustrating. Now, I mentioned only about 1/4 of the problems I’ve had with this TV. If I have one more problem within the next few days, I will return it and purchase a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Picture
customer_reviews.text: Great TV. Thin. Can cast iPhone video directly to TV. Best of all TV connections and electronics in external component with only a thin wire between it and display. Two minor issues: 1. Remote is not as feature rich as I would like it for working with Receiver and other external components 2. On occasion audio reverts to TV output instead of digital output (need to go to menu to reconfigure)
customer_reviews.author: IstariNight

customer_reviews.title: This TV is just assume, bright, crisp, supper colors and has so many apps built in. A
customer_reviews.text: The picture is bright, crisp, supper colors and has so many apps built in. I wasn't sure buying a year old model TV, but it is just assume. Easy set up, love the one connect box connection, has 4 HDMI connections should be enough. Just very happy, after reading some reviews I didn't know if that would happen to us. Vann's Electronics is great to deal with and this is the 2nd TV we have purchased from them, 12 years ago we bought a Panasonic, what they then called flat screen 52" TV, it still plays fine, just wanting the newer technology and this set hast that +.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lakernick

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, crisp picture...OneConnect system is outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: The OneConnect feature is outstanding. No need for cables behind the TV, allowing for a very nice flush mount to the wall. This is a handsome 75" TV as a result. Not a fan of all the Samsung bloatware, but the interface and remote are sleek and simple. The only negative comment regarding the picture is true dark screen will show some 'dirty screen' greys, but it certainly isn't awful. Really no way around this on an edge-lit LCD. I love this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick B Martin

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing with the no-gap wall mount
customer_reviews.text: An excellent TV when used with the no-gap wall mount. The one-connect box is very convenient for connecting other devices, and the fact that power is also transmitted through the same cable is definitely a plus. The remote control takes a couple of minutes to get used to with its rather minimalist design, but once you know the layout, it is so much more convenient than a bulky TV remote with dozens of buttons. I use the TV mostly with Chromecast or built-in apps (YouTubeTV, HBO Now, Netflix, etc.) and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective T.V.
customer_reviews.text: Defective out of the box. Lines at the bottom and on the side. Had to return it. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Someone

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy so far
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical that there was going to be a noticeable dfference between this TV and my older Samsung plasma but the picture is fantastic and I matched it with the Samsung sound bar which has enhanced the experience. It all synced with my Comcast remote. The "One Connect" is a clean wiring solution allowing you to set up without going through the wall. I was hoping to use my old mount but the new design of the TV made that impossible so I used the Samsung "No Gap Wall Mount," and I am very happy with that too. But thahk goodness for YouTube and good technical support from Samsung because because written instructions suck.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful TV. Love everything about it, especially the OneConnect box. Puts my 1080p 65" plasma TV to shame. Docking 1 star because out of the box, it had a problem where it would automatically power cycle itself after several hours of use, repeating every few minutes. Samsung support was something of a trial to get through, but once a technician was finally dispatched, they fixed it. Even with this problem, I recommend the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Andrew Smith

customer_reviews.title: Reality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV because I'm a Samsung enthusiast. I have been watching TV on this screen for 2 weeks now. The picture is super clear from any viewing angle. I watch sports, movies and play video games on this TV. As an everyday TV it definitely exceeds my expectations. I have read all the reviews about this TV, and it did make me a little nervous about purchasing one. All I can say is, dont believe everything you read, do your research and just know that it's just the luck of the draw when it comes to getting a bad product. It has happen to me before as well. Purchase the warranty, they will stay at your side.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great 4K TV for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great TV. Picture quality is a major upgrade from the old plasma I had previously. I like the remote functions and the voice command is a bonus. The TV was easy to setup and get going. The one connect box feature is great for being able to get rid of all the those wires coming from the TV. The main con from me would be the smart TV interface. I prefer just using my Roku.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a picture!!!
customer_reviews.text: So big, so bright, so clear!! Far and away the best TV I have ever owned. With the flush mount this thing only sits off the wall maybe an inch! The One Connect box is a bit big and bulky and if you need to mount/place it far away from the TV that might pose a problem since the cable is only so long. Only thing it lacks is the ethernet port is not gigabit rated.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy all over again for the great picture regardless of the negatives.
customer_reviews.text: Great picture! Q feature is Unbelievable! But hard to initially figure out how to use remote and settings. Older Air Pods won’t pair with 2018 model. Had to use computer (not past Samsung TV’s) skills to decipher how to use. Very heavy for self installation. Have 2-3 very strong people to install table top and especially wall mount. Very prompt delivery and courteous delivery (two of them). However, not at all experienced in use of type of TV with computer receiver/transmitter type controller box.
customer_reviews.author: MedMama887

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this tv. Do not buy from WALTSTV.
customer_reviews.text: This system is a real pos. We bought the tv from WaltsTV on Amazon. It arrived April 18th and the screen stopped working July 2. The warranty was only through July 31, and we had to wait 3 weeks for the parts and company to fix the tv. WaltsTV was not forthcoming in when the warranty would expire. Now the smarthub stopped working and won’t recognize inputs. This is the worst tv I’ve ever owned. A huge pile of non working error prone parts. I wouldn’t give this to my worst enemy. Save yourself hours of frustration and buy a tv locally that is NOT a Samsung and do not buy from Waltstv. They are useless af.
customer_reviews.author: Shelagh Sitterson

customer_reviews.title: So easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: Love my new TV. I replaced my 15 year old TV. After doing my research for days I finally made the decision. The one connect box is the coolest thing I have ever seen. One wire that's it. The little remote control took just a few days to get use to. The fact that it turns into wall art when not using it is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Wessner

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Warehouse rocks!!!
customer_reviews.text: Insane!!!! Warehouse deal $1999 with 20% off , $1599 WOW. Said acceptable I was expecting something. Said scratch on display. I have found nothing. Only large scratch was on the back of the unit. The unit is mounted with Samsung flush mount , scratch will never be seen again. Unit replaced a 75 inch MU8000 that was sent back to Samsung. Fabulous TV
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: SAMSUNG TV WAS DEFECTIVE MODEL (1,500$)
customer_reviews.text: We had a professional installer come and spent an entire afternoon attempting to make this TV work -- it kept turning itself on and off and finally the installer said "this is a defective TV." This is a 1,500 dollar item which is defective. It also messed up our wi-fi system -- we had to reinstall software on the wi-fi system -- it was a complete and utter disaster. We are thinking this seller may be selling third party defective equipment (as profiled on 60 minutes). We have asked for a replacement. Will let you know if we get any satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: a list party girl

customer_reviews.title: Nothing short of amazing.
customer_reviews.text: This TV is nothing short of amazing, pictures or video do not do it any justice, absolutely in love with this TV, my only regret is not spending the extra few hundred bucks and getting a larger size. I shopped around for sometime comparing and researching and was blown away that Amazon had the best price and free delivery, what more can you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great Piccture Quality
customer_reviews.text: In November 2015 I purchased a Samsung UN60JU6390FXZA TV. It was and is awesome. When our second TV died I consulted Consumer Report then purchased a Samsung QN65Q7FNAFXZA. The picture quality is truly amazing! I strongly recommend Samsung QLED technology. I'm not a gamer so I can't comment on that video quality but I can't think of a reason it would not also be outstanding. I added a Yamaha YAS-207 sound bar system (a Consumer Report Best Buy) they make an awesome combination.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Plautz

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Great TV it was very easy to start up set up get all of my different cable and DVD players installed. great TV
customer_reviews.author: Ben Begley

customer_reviews.title: Samsung is quality...but price is crazy
customer_reviews.text: Good TV, I'm happy but these prices are ridonkulous......bought it on a black friday deal and still needed some KY to deal with the ravaging. But overall samsung is pretty quality AF.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t don’t don’t. Sound sync is off and can’t be adjusted to work properly. The picture is ok but there’s no good all around pic setting. U have to adjust for sports and movies. The one connect box and cable is junk and the only company who makes it. It’s a 1/8” cable that is suppose to carry ALL the information from all your hdmi cables + power and it just doesn’t work. Again DONT BUY. I got a Sony X900F and way way better.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Russell

customer_reviews.title: Quick set-up, great picture and smart TV for cord cutters
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Packed very well so no damage. Setup was quick and easy but had a few problems with connecting to my home theater system but Google solved that problem. System has Samsung OneConnect so only one wire running up the wall! Enabled me to terminate my satellite service and save $100/month.
customer_reviews.author: Rosydoo

customer_reviews.title: Too Simplified
customer_reviews.text: Amazing picture however the remote is too simplistic. It is not easy to navigate on the TV especially since they don't provide a users manual. Also would have liked to have a component cable input to connect an older DVD player. I also had to buy an optical cable to connect the TV audio to the surround sound since there's no RCA jacks. I knew this going in but it still makes it harder to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gaming.
customer_reviews.text: Had the 2017 q7f and I really like the ambient mode they introduced on the 2018 models. The seller was very helpful with all my questions and the TV came all packed as new I love it!!!! I have to add it's been days since I had this TV and man is it an upgrade when playing ps4 pro the black levels are amazing and the motion technology is not just a gimmick
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Elizalde

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Choose another TV, the quality is just not there. Samsung and disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Q7FN
customer_reviews.text: Great TV with nice picture, features, I like the connect box concept but after taking off the protective film for the screen, I found a straight line that won’t go away. Samsung customer service not very helpful, can only provide a repair on a brand new TV I just tuned on the first day. Anyways Amazon issued a return that will follow with a refund. I wish I just got a swap( replacement)...... Returning this back. Will order another not sure if it will be Samsung, fingers crossed there is no issue with this. So many disappointments already.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel

customer_reviews.title: An instant classic
customer_reviews.text: This TV is amazing. If you can still find it, buy it. The 2019 version is crap. 2018 q7 has unmatched design. Will be a classic.
customer_reviews.author: Neto

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my eye on buying a Samsung Q Series TV for quite a while and it was well worth the wait. Crisp, colorful picture that I can’t stop watching. The television is actually better than I thought and has certainly lived up to its hype. I would recommend this TV for those looking to upgrade and enjoy a great viewing experience!! This is the 2nd TV that I have purchased from Vanns & I have been thoroughly pleased with their service!
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Tiny remote, but great tv
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV. It's great... Perfect picture and easy to use features. The wifi connect makes it very easy to mirror my Samsung phone on my TV screen.... Now 6 months later and it's still working great!
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great TV.  They don’t offer the separate turner in 2019
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd dame TV. THIS ONE $1,000 less. Love the optical data and power single line separate tuner. Great for my theater room where my equipment is located away from the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Kacey G.

customer_reviews.title: Stunning picture and colors.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Mint condition. Arrived in great shape. The outer box was dinged, but the tv comes wrapped in styrofoam , in its manufactured box, then inside its shipping box. The tv is mint. Beautiful picture. I mean stunning. Features are top notch. There isnt an app I couldnt find that didnt come preinstalled already. I love this tv!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality, and surround sound without adding additional speakers are both fantastic! I love the ambient mode, especially with it blending into the wall color. It has tons of apps to choose from, the auto color adjust feature is great for all lighting types. I honestly do not have one single complaint about this television. I did a ton of research before making this purchase, and am so happy with this choice.
customer_reviews.author: Marley

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: The slick one connect box setup looks great... until it stops working. I was 1 month out of warranty when my TV started spontaneously powering on. Check out prices for replacement one connect cables and boxes, they are a larger portion of the cost of the TV. I am going to be in for $600 in hopes that this thing stops powering itself on. For the technically inclined, yes, I isolated the problem to what I though was the cable, and later learned was the box.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box it was an easy setup. A little heavy and awkward to get it together and on a stand by yourself but I got it done. A 2nd person would've been a breeze. Hooking up my phone and devices were easy. Recognized everything.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Superb picture quality.
customer_reviews.text: This TV has superb picture quality in any room lighting. Setup was a breeze with the one-connect box. the smart features work well with my wireless internet. The sound is pretty impressive too.
customer_reviews.author: R Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent HD TV
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy. It is an excellent set. Every thing works just as advertised. The TV was shipped promptly and it was very easy to unpack and setup.
customer_reviews.author: dddinfl

customer_reviews.title: Possible bugs
customer_reviews.text: There is a common problem with this TV that makes it turn off and on on its own. We are working through the problem with Samsung. When it is working, the picture is beautiful and the features are very intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Did not know it came with OneConnect box
customer_reviews.text: The TV quality is good, but EVERYTHING including the power plugs into a box that connects through a small clear cord to the TV. There are no hdmi ports or any ports at all on the TV except for the little clear cable that runs from the box. We were mounting this TV on the wall above fireplace that had power and hdmi ran through the wall so in order to put this TV on the wall, we had to mount the OneConnect box to the wall behind the TV and make sure we had a wall mount that projected the TV several inches from the wall because the box is not small.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Huge pain in the ass
customer_reviews.text: This tv was a huge pain in the ass to install. They don’t tell you that this tv has a huge box that connects the tv to everything. You also have to be careful not to bend the one cable too much or it will break. I would not have bought this tv if I knew about the huge box.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Great TV and Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV. I was worried about buying a 2018 model and features for 2019 and I am so glad I didn't spend the extra money. Delivery was great! I called and the guy's brought it in the house for me.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hamm

customer_reviews.title: Great TV good price
customer_reviews.text: I havent really watched 4k movies but TV quality is good Only minor: Remote control is a bit sensitive. SO when u put it in the pocket and lay on the table, it may change channel by itself. Very sensitive remote control buttons
customer_reviews.author: Samir Fouzir

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV and Unbelievable Picture
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase and the picture is outstanding. Now I just need to find a good sound system to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dudtal

customer_reviews.title: Wow, what a picture!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an aging Panasonic Plasma with this new QLED by Samsung. Big difference! Viewing angles, of course, are not as great as Plasma, although not as bad as some on the market. Overall, a great picture with excellent color rendering and deep, dark blacks, and we would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and price..!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the overall look of this tv..The picture quality is fantastic..Best TV I have ever owned...The sound is also really great..!!I am so glad I found this TV..Best purchase I've made in a long time..😃
customer_reviews.author: DONNA M

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Picture!
customer_reviews.text: The picture is amazing! Only bad thing is it’s hard to find a mount that fits the pattern for hanging it on a wall. I recommend you find one while you’re considering purchasing this tv. But then together if you can. The tv itself is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: jerseysouix

customer_reviews.title: Great 4K TV!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to purchase the mid tier QLED since I couldn't afford the Q9 price or the wait to afford it. So, I settled on the QLED 7FN instead of the 8FN due to the lack of a connection box on the 8FN. Otherwise, I would have purchased the 8FN. Enjoying my plug and play centerpiece for my 5.2.4 Dolby Atmos DTS-X theater system.
customer_reviews.author: terrence kess

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, works well, easy to setup.
customer_reviews.text: Tv was easy to setup, and the smart hub is also easy to navigate. Very intuitive. Performance wise, picture looks amazing. I’m not an expert able to compare models but I simply have nothing to complain about. Tv even automatically switch to “Gaming mode” when I start playing on the Xbox. Sounds is also very good. I use the Tv in a small room and I’m not planning to buy a sound system at the moment.... it is simply very good like that.
customer_reviews.author: Abram

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy a TV with a one connect box
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend a tv with a one connect box. Had to get a technician to replace once already because it was "damaged" and started to see issues again. Warning that even bending the wire can permanently cause damage. Very poor product and shame on Samsung for making such a great tv that could be crippled by a wire
customer_reviews.author: C Andrews

customer_reviews.title: TV turns on and off by itself
customer_reviews.text: The first few months were fine. The picture quality is very good. Then 6 months in it started turning itself on and off. I worked through all of the cures posted on the Samsung support site. None has worked. Contacted Samsung twice now. Sent a software upgrade. That didn't work. Today, tech went on remotely to change settings only they can change. Turned off the 'auto-on' setting. He promises it will fix the problem. We shall see.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Terrible picture quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Plenty of smart TV options and full slate of apps. Cons: image quality, especially performance in dark scenes is completely unacceptable. The baxk light bleeds through on dark scenes and simple things like changing the volume or having subtitles will cause entire screen to have white bloom. Called Samsung support and they said TV was within specs but they only run a test in a bright image which looks very good. Their soec doesn't cover dark images, TV is basically unusable at night.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Samsung never disappoints. Picture quality on this TV is great, but my favorite feature is the all-in-one cable box. Much less clutter and better than running all my cables directly to the TV itself.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Kenefick

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTE DISAPPOINTMENT - Black Vertical Discoloration Bar
customer_reviews.text: After spending $2,797.97, or $3,021.83 after-tax, and only after 14 months of use did our screen become horrible, and almost unbearable to watch. We have four other Samsung televisions (all older) and have never had a problem. We are outside of the return and service period so it appears we are at a loss. I realize some promotions included extended warranties but I would have never thought a previous top-notch company would provide a failed product. Oh, and thanks for Amazon as vendor. I'm heading to Best Buy to buy an LG this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Pospisil

customer_reviews.title: This TV dies after 14 months (has known issues)
customer_reviews.text: TV looked great and i was very happy with the design of the One Connect Box. Invested in the proprietary slim wall mount. The 75 inch Q7 died after 14 months, with horizontal lines through the screen. I've read others had this issues as well. Samsung is giving me a partial refund. New model of TV does not work with last years wall mount so I'll have to reinstall that (not easy like they say) Big disappointment and waste of my time.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great picture.  There is glare from near by window.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the picture is outstanding compared to our 10 year old HD TV. The is quite a bit more glare.
customer_reviews.author: Tom H. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture and good sound.
customer_reviews.text: Hoping that there are more 4K programs, for the ones that I see, the picture is superb! Remote is probably the only thing lacking, for you must do most on screen, using remote to navigate.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Samsung QN75Q7FN
customer_reviews.text: It's a little pricey however, you get what you pay for. The picture quality is what sold me on the unit.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: Hortizontal line across screen, had to return.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to be a pretty decent TV but it lasted less than a few hours and then I got a permanent horizontal line across the TV. Amazon rep was very helpful, did some troubleshooting and worked with Samsung rep on phone to figure out that it was a faulty screen. TV was returned. Maybe will try a different brand now.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, even if it’s not very smart
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of the hardware, picture and sound quality. However, do not count on the smart features of this TV. If it can connect to wireless it is to slow to stream correctly. I’d recommend having a separate streaming device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Watch'n
customer_reviews.text: This TV is better than I expected. I love it!! Smart control is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: GMan

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this tv if you like your blacks to be really black!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of the picture when it comes to bright scenery,but when it comes to black scenes the black is a little light or gray. Don't buy this tv if you like your blacks to be really black amd you should spend more and go with OLED or higher end samsung like the 8 or 9 series.
customer_reviews.author: Omar K.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, great product, great shipping, great company.
customer_reviews.text: Product was brand new still in the box with all components still wrapped in plastic. I installed the tv myself on the way in about an hour. It looks amazing. It’s been over a week and no issues. Everything works great. Will use this company again for my next purchase. Saved me 700 bucks !! And came right to my door.
customer_reviews.author: Hott sauce pepper

customer_reviews.title: Ease of setup
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike here. The one connect box sets this TV apart from all others. No longer do I have to fumble behind the tv to connect a new device. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality, one-wire connect is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Besides the great picture quality, the one connect concept is the winner!
customer_reviews.author: MRB

customer_reviews.title: Great tv.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the greatest picture I have ever seen. It’s impossible to describe the colors and detail.
customer_reviews.author: John T.

customer_reviews.title: Newer TVs are always fun to learn to use!
customer_reviews.text: Called for service. My frustrated son didn't *pop* that TV electric cord on to TV hard enough!!!!!!! Dumb directions!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. R

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time, high quality product, excellent picture, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Z.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this t.v. it replaced a Samsung plasma. The plasma always had a great picture, but was always a bit dark. This qled is a nicer picture and gets plently bright. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Gunther Walton

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic picture! Samsung TVs forever!
customer_reviews.text: Best TV I've ever owned. Everything about the picture quality is among the best I've seen. The smart features are so intuitive. Everything is fast and easy. What else can I say? This thing is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This TV is fantastic. Love the QLED. Have a 4K in another room and while both pictures are awesome this one is slightly better.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M Karsh

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but it’s a great TV and it looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Love the way the wires or overnight and plug it into the single box
customer_reviews.author: Max L.

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality was better than expected, especially in 4K. I like the user interface, very intuitive and easy to navigate. The whole Samsung design of Q7fn is minimalistic but yet sophisticated. Looks great in my room and no gap wall mount feature is slick.
customer_reviews.author: Edp

customer_reviews.title: So far, no problems
customer_reviews.text: Have had to TV for less than one month. So Far, no problems. Easy to set up. No big learning curve with the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Pancho

customer_reviews.title: Great TV and Features
customer_reviews.text: Great TV and picture quality! Only thing was the TV Remote randomly stopped functioning properly and would only cut the tv on and off. After 2 days it started working properly again. Don’t know if I’ll need to replace it or not in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as OLED, but for the money you won't beat it.
customer_reviews.text: I have an OLED in the same room and it's noticeably better, though I like the features on this screen much more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comes with one connect box
customer_reviews.text: Great tv with amazing picture quality! I was debating between this model and newer version 2019 but after looking and comparing all the features went with 2018. Their isn’t much picture quality difference and 2018 model comes with one box. Really looks beautiful and clean look with one connect wire.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Picture even for NON-4K content
customer_reviews.text: This TV is amazing, regular old HD programming Looks much better and sharper than on old TV, bright blinding color rich picture, Dont skimp get the QLED it is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Charles W Aurora-CO

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: When the WiFi works the picture is assume. Had Sharp LED TV’s before. World of difference
customer_reviews.author: Mark S Servidio

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: To the moon and back is an understatement. This is the Gold Rush of televisions
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV. The picture is amazing. It turns off by itself from time to time, but I read that it does that sometimes. All in all I love this TV
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: The tv is great.
customer_reviews.text: We love the tv but we had a defective one connect cable that took several calls and weeks to get resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Susan / David H.

customer_reviews.title: TV did not power up.
customer_reviews.text: We could not get TV to turn on. All,of the electronics are contained in a separate black box.
customer_reviews.author: old geek

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Box came undamaged and was easy to set up. It has a gorgeous picture quality. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: This is a great TV. I'm Completely happy with this TV. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Moya

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Top end video. Easy to set up. The separate control/connectivity box is a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

product_meta.title: Samsung QN55Q7FN FLAT 55” QLED 4K UHD 7 Series Smart TV 2018
product_meta.description: Size:55-Inch| Style:TVA blend of style and performance, the Q7 mounts flush to the wall. One thin cable attaches all of your components. Q Color and an anti-glare screen make the Q7 genius. *Mount sold separately.
feature_bullets: Dimensions w/ stand: 48.3" W x 11.2" D x 30.9" H | W/o stand 48.3" W x 1.8" D x 27.7" H | Stand width: 33.5"
Q Contrast Plus: Experience dramatic depth with incredibly deep blacks and an anti reflective screen
Q HDR Elite: Step up to Elite class HDR with the power to reveal stunning details and in depth vibrant colors
Q Color: Push the boundaries of color with Quantum Dots and a billion shades, reserved for our flagship QLED TVs.
Q Style Elite: Designed to achieve aesthetic excellence by minimizing wires and mounting flush to the wall as a picture.

Ambient Mode: With our new Ambient Mode, you can elevate your living room with decorative content, useful information, your own photos, and even some background music; You won’t notice the TV on the wall as it blends perfectly with your décor
Smart TV with Bixby Voice: A revolutionary way to help find streaming and live TV shows with a universal guide, OneRemote and voice assistance

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars374 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
